login_css.body::after: background: url(./img/logob.png); background-size: auto 100%; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-repeat: no-repeat; opacity: 0.05;
login_css..lgbox: top: max(80px, calc(50% - 20%)); left: max(400px, calc(70% - 160px)); width: 320px; background-color: #ffffff; border-radius: 20px; box-shadow: -2px 6px 53px -23px rgba(0,0,0,0.75); padding: 10px 40px 10px 20px; font-size: smaller;
login_css..langbox: top: max(560px, calc(100vh - 40px)); right: 40px; color: white;
login_css..advtextbox > p: font-weight: 400; font-family: 'Raleway'; font-size: smaller; background-color: #ffffff; color: black; border-radius: 10px; padding: 10px 5px 10px 5px; width: 120px; left: calc(50% - 60px); margin-top: 30px;
login_css.span#signin: top: 40px; right: 100px; position: absolute; font-size: 0.8em; font-weight: 500; color: #0c0d0e;

en.title: Monkvision Dashboards
en.loginsubtag: World's only enterprise-wide AI based active monitorting solution.

register_css.body::after: background: url(./img/logob.png); background-size: auto 100%; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-repeat: no-repeat; opacity: 0.05;
register_css..lgbox: top: max(80px, 25%); left: max(400px, calc(70% - 160px)); width: 320px; background-color: #ffffff; border-radius: 20px; box-shadow: -2px 6px 53px -23px rgba(0,0,0,0.75); padding: 10px 20px 10px 20px; font-size: smaller; padding-right: 40px;
register_css..langbox: top: max(560px, calc(100vh - 40px)); right: 40px; color: white;
register_css..advtextbox > p: font-weight: 400; font-family: 'Raleway'; font-size: smaller; background-color: #ffffff; color: black; border-radius: 10px; padding: 10px 5px 10px 5px; width: 120px; left: calc(50% - 60px); margin-top: 30px;
register_css.span#signin: top: 40px; right: 100px; position: absolute; font-size: 0.8em; font-weight: 500; color: #0c0d0e;

en.title: Monkvision Dashboards
en.loginsubtag: World's only enterprise-wide AI based active monitorting solution.

main_css.span#header > span#title: font-size: 0.85em; font-weight: bold; background-color: white; box-shadow: 0 0 1px rgba(34, 25, 25, 0.4); color: rgba(0,0,0,0.75);
main_css.input#datetimepickerfrom, input#datetime: font-size: 0.8em; font-family: sans-serif; color: rgba(0,0,0,0.75); box-shadow: 0 0 1px rgba(34, 25, 25, 0.4); border-style: none;

main_html_data.span-with-menu#gear: styleBody='div.menuitem:hover{background: #45d19e !important; color: white !important;} span#content > img:hover{filter: brightness(70%);transition: all 1s ease;} div#menu{margin-left: -120px;}'
main_html_data.span-with-menu#toggle-theme: styleBody='div.menuitem:hover{background: #45d19e !important; color: white !important;} span#content > img:hover{filter: brightness(70%);transition: all 1s ease;} div#menu{margin-left: -40px;}'

pdf_report_css.input#datetimepickerfrom, input#datetime: font-size: 0.8em; font-family: sans-serif; color: rgba(0,0,0,0.75);border-radius: 4px; box-shadow: 0 0 1px rgba(34, 25, 25, 0.4); padding: 2px; border-style: none; pointer-events: none;
pdf_report_css.div#pdf-preview-maincontent: top: 120px; width: calc(95vw - 100px); height: calc(100vh - 120px); left: 100px;
pdf_report_css.@media print: div#pdf-preview-container {display: none;} div#pdf-preview-maincontent{top: unset; width: 100vw; height: 100vh; left: unset;}
